# This is a CMake initial cache file
# Use:
#  cd BUILD
#  ccmake -C <path/to/thisfile>  ..
set(BUILD_AVS OFF CACHE BOOL "NO")
set(BUILD_BELIEFS ON CACHE BOOL "Build beliefs")
set(BUILD_DORA OFF CACHE BOOL "Build dora specific code")
set(BUILD_GEORGE ON CACHE BOOL "Build george specific code")
set(BUILD_HAL_BLOBFINDER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware blobfinder")
set(BUILD_HAL_BLOBFINDER_PLAYER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware ptz: player version")
set(BUILD_HAL_LASER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware laser")
set(BUILD_HAL_LASER_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware laser tests")
set(BUILD_HAL_PTZ OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware ptz")
set(BUILD_HAL_PTZ_PLAYER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware ptz: player version")
set(BUILD_HAL_ROBOT OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware robotbase")
set(BUILD_HAL_ROBOT_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware robot tests")
set(BUILD_HAL_STEREO ON CACHE BOOL "Build hardware stereo")
set(BUILD_HAL_STEREO_GPU OFF CACHE BOOL "Build the GPU Library for Stereo Server")
set(BUILD_HAL_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware tests")
set(BUILD_HAL_TTS ON CACHE BOOL "Build hardware tts")
set(BUILD_HAL_UTILS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build hardware utils")
set(BUILD_HAL_VIDEO ON CACHE BOOL "Build hardware video")
set(BUILD_HAL_VIDEO_IMG_SEQ ON CACHE BOOL "Build image sequence video server")
set(BUILD_HAL_VIDEO_IMG_SEQ_UI ON CACHE BOOL "Build UI for image sequence server (requires Visualization SA)")
set(BUILD_HAL_VIDEO_LIVE OFF CACHE BOOL "Build live video server")
set(BUILD_HAL_VIDEO_POINTGREY OFF CACHE BOOL "Build Point Grey video server")
set(BUILD_MULTI_TESTER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build multi-sa tester")
set(BUILD_PYTHON_COMPONENTS ON CACHE BOOL "Build Python Ice Interfaces and Components")
set(BUILD_ROCS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build the internal version of the ROCS library.")
set(BUILD_SA_BINDING ON CACHE BOOL "Build binder subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_CATEGORICAL OFF CACHE BOOL "Build categorical subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_COMA OFF CACHE BOOL "Build sa_coma specific code")
set(BUILD_SA_CONCEPTUAL OFF CACHE BOOL "Build conceptual subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_DEFAULT OFF CACHE BOOL "Build default subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_DIALOGUE ON CACHE BOOL "Build dialogue subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_EXECUTION ON CACHE BOOL "Build execution subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_FAKE_MOTIVATION ON CACHE BOOL "Build fake motivation subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_MOTIVATION ON CACHE BOOL "Build motivation subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER ON CACHE BOOL "Build planner subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER_BNET OFF CACHE BOOL "Build bayesian network evaluator")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER_DOWNWARD ON CACHE BOOL "Build fast downward planner in planner.sa")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER_DT ON CACHE BOOL "Build DT planner in planner.sa")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER_PROB_DOWNWARD OFF CACHE BOOL "Build probabillistic fast downward planner in planner.sa")
set(BUILD_SA_PLANNER_TFD ON CACHE BOOL "Build TFD planner in planner.sa")
set(BUILD_SA_SPATIAL OFF CACHE BOOL "Build spatial subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_SPATIAL_PEEKABOT ON CACHE BOOL "Build spatial.sa PeekaBot components")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N ON CACHE BOOL "Build visualization libraries (Requires QT4)")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_AUTOGEN_ONLY OFF CACHE BOOL "ONLY build autogen parts of V11N")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_CLIENT ON CACHE BOOL "Build the visualisation display client library")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_CLIENT_FILE_MONITOR ON CACHE BOOL "Build file monitor visualisation client")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_DEBUG_TRACE OFF CACHE BOOL "Output a lot of debugging information")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_SERVER ON CACHE BOOL "Build the visualisation display server")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_STANDALONE ON CACHE BOOL "Build the standalone display server for V11N")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build the test component for V11N")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_USE_LUAGL OFF CACHE BOOL "Build with LuaGl script support (requres lua51 and tolua++51)")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_USE_TOMGINE OFF CACHE BOOL "Build with support for TomGine models (requires vision.sa)")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_USE_WEBKIT ON CACHE BOOL "Build with HTML support (Qt-WebKit)")
set(BUILD_SA_V11N_USE_WEBKIT_PLUGINS ON CACHE BOOL "Enable plugins in HTML pages (Qt-WebKit)")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION ON CACHE BOOL "Build vision subarchitecure")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_CAMERA_MOUNT OFF CACHE BOOL "build camera mount")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_DISPLAY_CONVEXHULL_PB OFF CACHE BOOL "build convex hull display")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_FERNS OFF CACHE BOOL "build FERNS detector")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJANALYZER ON CACHE BOOL "build Object Analyzer")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJDETECTOR OFF CACHE BOOL "build object detector")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJRECOGNIZER OFF CACHE BOOL "build object recognizer")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJRECOGNIZER_3D OFF CACHE BOOL "build Object Recognizer")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJRECOGNIZER_3D2 OFF CACHE BOOL "build Object Recognizer2 (for George)")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_OBJTRACKER OFF CACHE BOOL "build object tracker")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_PEOPLE_DETECTOR OFF CACHE BOOL "build people detector")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_PG_VIEWER OFF CACHE BOOL "build PointGrey Viewer")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_PLANEPOPOUT ON CACHE BOOL "build plane pop-out (needs hardware/stereo)")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_RECONSTRUCTION OFF CACHE BOOL "build visual reconstruction")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_SHAPEDESCRIPTOR_3D OFF CACHE BOOL "build 3D shape descriptor")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_SIMULATION ON CACHE BOOL "Build Simulated Vision")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_SOI2ROI ON CACHE BOOL "build SOI2ROI")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_SOIFILTER ON CACHE BOOL "build SOI filter")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_STEREODETECTOR OFF CACHE BOOL "build stereo detector")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_STEREOFLAPDETECTOR OFF CACHE BOOL "build stereo flap detector")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_STEREOVIEWER ON CACHE BOOL "build stereo viewer (needs hardware/stereo)")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_TEST_COMP OFF CACHE BOOL "build test component")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_UTIL_COMPS ON CACHE BOOL "build dummy driver, video viewer, video grabber")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_VIRTUALSCENE OFF CACHE BOOL "build Virtual Scene")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_VIRTUALSCENE_TEST OFF CACHE BOOL "build Virtual Scene Test")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_VISLEARNER ON CACHE BOOL "Build UOL visual learning component")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_VISLEARNER_CTF OFF CACHE BOOL "Build Matlab CTF for UOL visual learner; off=use prebuilt CTF")
set(BUILD_SA_VISION_VISMEDIATOR OFF CACHE BOOL "build Visual Mediator")
set(BUILD_SCENARIO_SHARED ON CACHE BOOL "Build shared scenario code")
set(LIBBUILD_CUDASIFT OFF CACHE BOOL "Build CudaSift library")
set(LIBBUILD_LEVMAR_HOMEST ON CACHE BOOL "Build homest & levmar libraries required by the 3D shape detector")
set(LIBBUILD_PYTHON_VISION OFF CACHE BOOL "Build Python interfaces for some of the libs used by vision.sa")
set(LIBBUILD_SIFTGPU OFF CACHE BOOL "Build SiftGPU library")
set(LIBBUILD_SIFTGPU_WITH_CUDA OFF CACHE BOOL "Build SiftGPU library with CUDA support")
